name: carlos
image_alt: be careful !! don't step on him
who: carlos is... um... he's really fast. he comes from a parody game of the infamous little guy called "sonic the hedgehog", i think you've heard of them.
look: so, imagine this; sonic the hedgehog, but comically small, with dot eyes, and without the skin colored circle in his chest, and also really simplified, and with cornflower blue fur. that's carlos.
info: he does not really... speak. he just has one specific voiceline:

yes, he has friends:

  • samuel (tails)

  • santiago (knuckles)

  • antonio (dr. robotnik)

  • ...and more which i'm too lazy to list.
